Literature.Title: Inhibitory effect of short cationic homopeptides against Gram-positive bacteria
Literature.Author: Marshall S, Ojeda C, Albericio F, Carvajal-Rondanelli P, Guzmán F

Literature.Title: Inhibitory effect of short cationic homopeptides against Gram-negative bacteria
Literature.Author: Carvajal-Rondanelli P, Aróstica M, Marshall SH, Albericio F, Álvarez CA, Ojeda C, Aguilar LF, Guzmán F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(90-100% Inhibition=10-30µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(90-100% Inhibition=10-30µM),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(90-100% Inhibition=10-30µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(90-100% Inhibition=10-30µM),Bacillus cereus ATCC 10876(80-90% Inhibition=20µM),Bacillus cereus ATCC 10876(90-100% Inhibition=30µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(90-100% Inhibition=10-30µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(90-100% Inhibition=10µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(90-100% Inhibition=20µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(90-100% Inhibition=30µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ISP 72-01(90-100% Inhibition=10-30µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(90-100% Inhibition=10-30µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ISP 1833-99(90-100% Inhibition=10-30µM),Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 7966(50-60% Inhibition=10µM),Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 7966(50-60% Inhibition=20µM),Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 7966(60-70% Inhibition=30µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(40-50% Inhibition=10µM)
